title: Mathematics & Statistics
content:
Essential Mathematical Foundations

Based on your probability course materials, focus on:

  • Linear Algebra: Vector spaces, eigendecomposition, singular value decomposition
  • Probability Theory: Random variables, distributions, expectation, variance, concentration inequalities
  • Statistical Inference: Maximum likelihood, Bayesian inference, hypothesis testing

Advanced Topics from Your Probability Materials

  • Information Theory: Entropy, KL divergence, mutual information
  • Stochastic Processes: Markov models, Poisson processes
  • Statistical Learning Theory: VC dimension, PAC learning, generalization bounds

CS229 Mathematical Foundations

Key mathematical concepts from Stanford's ML course that underpin algorithm development and analysis.

Resources

Probability course materials - Advanced ML/statistics concepts for deep understanding of machine learning theory
